name: NSErrorPointerWrapper
summary: Wrapper for handling iOS SDK APIs that take in error by reference.
description:
Set of wrapper functioncs that simplify handling of methods that take in `NSErrorPoint`. Some of the benefits:

- no more declaring that pesky `NSError` variable to pass by reference (use `$0` shorthand argument name in closure passed to wrapper)
- chaining for success and failure handling
- streamlined downcasting handling (needed because often the result of those methods is `AnyObject?` instance)
